title: Common Architecture Language Model (CALM) Timelines Vocab

moments.description: A list of significant architecture states or points in time, each represented as a 'moment'.

detail.description: A link to an architecture or sub-timeline document.

valid-from.description: The date when this architecture moment came into effect.

adrs.description: External links to ADRs (Architecture Decision Records) or similar documents that provide context or decisions related to why the architecture changed.
